repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
The manuscript is a commentary on the Vyavahārakaṇḍa, second chapter of the Yājñavalkyasmṛti. It is a vyākhyā by the Vijñāneśvara.
Some text written in Granth on the first two folio which is not clear.

msItem.title: Mitākṣarā of Vijñāneśvara (Vyavahārakaṇḍa)
msItem.author: Vijñāneśvara

filiation.p: Aufrecht Catalogus Vol. 1, p. 454 New Catalogus Catalogorum vol. 20, p. 214.

msItem.finalRubric: [200r 1] iti śrīmatpadmanābhabhaṭṭopādhyāyātmajasya śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājaka… 2 … ṭṭārakasya kṛtau ṛjumitākṣarāyāṃ yājñavalkyadharmmaśāstravivṛtaudvitīyodhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ .

support.p: Thin palm leaf as guard folio.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, one blank folio at the beginning, 200 written folio.

additions.desc: [Vya]vahārakaṇḍa is written in the left margin. The first letter is damaged due to broken edges. Before the title is written neśvaram, seems that the name of the author is mentioned but due to damage of the folio only part is legible.
bhyo namaḥ [ṇe]śāya namaḥ in the left margin. But due to broken side there is lacuna. [ṇe] is emended as it could be gaṇeśāya. on ṇaśāya namaḥ is legible.

On 200v the last folio of the manuscript a table of content is given mentioning the title of each section of the second chapter and number of verses of that sections. for exmple: sambhuyasamutthānam 7 steyam 17. The table is written in three columns.
On folio 200r 1 iti śrīmatpadmanābhabhaṭṭopādhyāyātmajasya śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājaka… 2 … ṭṭārakasya kṛtau ṛjumitākṣarāyāṃ yājñavalkyadharmmaśāstravivṛtaudvitīyodhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ .

listBibl.bibl: Yajnavalkya Smrti (with the Mitakshara Commentary, Subodhini and Balambhatta's Gloss) Edited by: S.S. Setlur, B.A. L.L.B. Brahmavadin Press, Georgetown, Madras (Chennai): 1912.

encodingDesc.p: dots are used to show lacuna.

TEI.text:
[1v 1] abhiṣekādiguṇayuktasya rājñaḥ prajāpālanaṃ …. tacca dṛṣṭanigrahamantareṇa na saṃbhavati duṣṭaparijñānañca na vyavahāradarśanena vine
[200r 1] ...... grahaṇe pūrvasvāminaḥ svatvavicchedābāvāt . iti śrīmatpadmanābhabhaṭṭopādhyāyātmajasya śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājaka… [200r 2] … ṭṭārakasya kṛtau ṛjumitākṣarāyāṃ yājñavalkyadharmmaśāstravivṛtaudvitīyodhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ . asminnadhyāye prakaraṇānukramaṇikā kathyate ... [200r 3] .... mātṛkāprakaraṇaṃ suktilakṣaṇaṃ ṛṇādānaṃ 4 niḥkṣepa 5 sākṣī lakṣaṇaṃ 6 lekhyaṃ 7 dīvya. 8 dāyavibhāgaḥ 9 sīmāvivādaḥ 10 svāmipā [200r 4] lavivādaḥ 11 asvāmivikrayaḥ 12 dattāpradānikaṃ 13 krītvānuśayaḥ abhyupetyaśuśruṣā 14 saṃvidyatikramaH 15 vetanādānaṃ 16 dyuta . [200r 5] māhvayā. 17 vākpāruṣyam 18 daṇḍapāruṣyam 19 sahansam 20 vikriyāsaṃpradānam 21 sambhūyasamuthānam 22 steaṃ 23 strīsaṃgrahaṇam 24 prakīr [200r 6] kaṃ 25 idi pañcaviṃśatiprakaraṇāni uttamopadasyeyaṃ śiṣyasya kṛtirātmanaḥ dharmmaśāstrasya vivṛtirvijñāneśvarasurīṇaḥ
